job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a GenAI engineer, you will play a crucial role in GenAI projects, contributing significantly to the development of impactful and responsible user-centered products and services. Drawing upon your expertise in both quantitative and qualitative research, you will strategically identify optimal methods to inspire, guide, and formulate the GenAI data architecture-from having a strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms to using wide variety of AI/ML techniques to solve business problems. We seek an individual comfortable with uncertainty, possessing excellent communication skills, and showcasing a blend of rigor and creativity when tackling open-ended questions, shaping early ideas, and rigorously testing GenAI solutions.
   * Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems.
   * Use visualization tools/modules to be able to explore and analyze outcomes & for Model validation eg: using Power BI / Tableau
   * Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment
job_details.full_text:
Gen AI Engineer

As a GenAI engineer, you will play a crucial role in GenAI projects, contributing significantly to the development of impactful and responsible user-centered products and services. Drawing upon your expertise in both quantitative and qualitative research, you will strategically identify optimal methods to inspire, guide, and formulate the GenAI data architecture-from having a strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms to using wide variety of AI/ML techniques to solve business problems. We seek an individual comfortable with uncertainty, possessing excellent communication skills, and showcasing a blend of rigor and creativity when tackling open-ended questions, shaping early ideas, and rigorously testing GenAI solutions.
   * Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems.
   * Use visualization tools/modules to be able to explore and analyze outcomes & for Model validation eg: using Power BI / Tableau
   * Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes designing and implementing GenAI use cases, working with GenAI algorithms, and applying AI/ML techniques to solve business problems. It also mentions building CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

phrases: Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems
job_tasks.justification: The phrases indicate a need to understand how GenAI can be applied to address specific business challenges and create value for institutions.

phrases: strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms
using wide variety of AI/ML techniques
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly refer to the core activities of understanding, applying, and validating AI and GenAI algorithms and techniques.

phrases: development of impactful and responsible user-centered products and services
job_tasks.justification: The description points to building user-centered products, defining architecture, and testing solutions, which are integral to software development in an AI context.

phrases: Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions building CI/CD pipelines, a key component of MLOps for deploying models.

technologies.justification: These are specific tools used for data visualization.
Refers to the underlying models and algorithms used in GenAI.

technologies.phrase: CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment
technologies.justification: This phrase describes a core MLOps practice.

soft_skills.justification: Directly states the requirement for strong communication abilities.

soft_skills.phrase: comfortable with uncertainty, possessing excellent communication skills, and showcasing a blend of rigor and creativity when tackling open-ended questions, shaping early ideas, and rigorously testing GenAI solutions.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the need to handle ambiguity, apply rigor and creativity to solve problems, and test solutions.
Implies a need to adapt and learn in a dynamic environment.
Suggests a proactive role in developing and bringing forward new concepts.
